DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective compare postprandial glycemic response healthy overweight adult consume amino acid drink mix versus control drink .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Fasting blood glucose level ≥ 70mg/dL ≤ 125 mg/dL . 2 . Subject state he/she type 1 2 diabetes . 3 . Subject overweight define waist circumference ≥ 101 cm ( 40 inch ) male ; ≥ 88 cm ( 35 inch ) female . 4 . Subject 's BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 . 5 . Subject 's blood pressure < 140 mm Hg systolic < 90 mm Hg diastolic . 6 . Subject 20 45 year age , inclusive . 7 . Subject male nonpregnant , nonlactating female , least 6 week postpartum prior screen visit . 8 . If female childbearing potential , practice birth control 9 . If subject chronic medication thyroid medication hormone therapy , constant dosage least two month prior screen visit . 1 . Subject eat low carbohydrate diet Atkins , Zone , South Beach diet plan . 2 . Subject state he/she current infection , inpatient surgery , corticosteroid treatment last 3 month antibiotic last 3 week prior screen visit . 3 . Subject state he/she active malignancy . 4 . Subject state he/she significant cardiovascular event ≤ six month prior screen visit ; state history congestive heart failure . 5 . Subject state he/she endstage organ failure status post organ transplant . 6 . Subject state he/she history renal disease . 7 . Subject state he/she current hepatic disease . 8 . Subject state he/she chronic , contagious , infectious disease , active tuberculosis , Hepatitis B C , HIV . 9 . Subject taken/is currently take herbal , dietary supplement , medication past four week prior screen visit could profoundly affect blood glucose . 10 . Subject taken/is currently take herbal , dietary supplement , medication past four week prior screen visit control hypertension cholesterol . 11 . Subject state he/she clot bleeding disorder .
